name: Umair Sarfraz

quotes.text: Do not spoil what you have by desiring what you have not; remember that what you now have was once among the things you only hoped for.
Laughing is a bad infirmity of human nature, which every thinking mind will strive to overcome.
There are no facts, only interpretations.

intro: Hello, welcome to my personal website. I am currently working as a Researcher (Application Development Lead) at Distributed Artificial Intelligence (DAI) Lab at Technical University Berlin. My primary focus is research and development of showcase / simulation applications for autonomous driving.
programming: I have been reading and writing code for a very long time. I have a strong aptitude for product / application development and that has been my focus area for the most part of my professional career. Since early 2018, I have been working in the Distributed Ledger aka Blockchain domain. Prior to that, I was actively involved in the development of service oriented solutions for cloud infrastructure. Recently, I have switched to mobility where I am researching and developing showcase / simulation applications for autonomous driving.
